name: Core Bore (pixlblade)
description:
Core Bore

"Welcome to your new internship! You'll be here for only a few billion years. Your only job is to fuse these particles to keep this star alive. All you have to do is click and drag them into each other, but be careful, as you can't mess this up, otherwise a supernova explosion will most likely occur. No pressure!"

Your new internship is... well, less than stellar. But that won't stop you from making the most out of it! Click and drag the particles to merge them, and try to stop the core from imploding on itself! (esc for pause menu)

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #14.

Credits
  • pixlblade for art assets, programming and music
